Detailed Description

Class that receives the incoming messages to a module.

The one and only task for this module is to read the packets from the network and insert them into the incoming packets queue.

Parameters:
q The queue with to insert the incomming packets.
leaderIP The IP-address to the leader-multicast group in hex.
leaderPort The port used for leader-group.
availableIP The IP-address to the available-multicast group in hex.
availablePort The port used for available-group.

virtual void PacketReaderThread::run (   )  [virtual]
 

This is the method that performes all work.

And that is: {enumerate} Read one UDP from the network into a Packet. Insert the Packet into the queue. Repeat from 1. {enumeration}

void PacketReaderThread::setPushList (  ModulePushList *  pushList  ) 
 

Sets the push list.

Done from the reader if push is wanted. Must be done before start().
